pages.text: The Igneous Extruder is a device that will generate infinite stone when surrounded with the appropriate blocks and fluids. It requires an adjacent lava source block and an adjacent coolant block; it can optionally take a block underneath. Refer to JEI for all the available recipes.

pages.title: Igneous Extruder
pages.text: At first, it will produce 1 block per second, but this can be augmented up to 4/sec using $(l:thermal:technology/augments/integral_components)integral components$(/l). If the recipe is changed, any blocks in the output slot will be voided to make room for the blocks from the new recipe.
